inputs.name: base_url
inputs.description: The base URL of the Jira instance.

inputs.name: username
inputs.description: Username for Basic authentication. Recommended only for scripts or bots.

inputs.name: password
inputs.description: Password for Basic authentication. Recommended only for scripts or bots.

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: Personal access token (PAT) for authentication. This method uses the user account associated with the token.

inputs.name: ref
inputs.description: The fully-formed reference of the branch or tag that triggered the workflow run.

inputs.name: issue_pattern
inputs.description: Pattern to match strings referencing an alphanumeric issue, e.g., ABC-1234.

inputs.name: transition
inputs.description: Move the issue to a specific status, e.g., Done, In Progress.

inputs.name: resolution
inputs.description: Set the resolution of the issue, e.g., Done, Fixed.

inputs.name: assignee
inputs.description: Assign the issue to a specific user.

inputs.name: comment
inputs.description: The comment to add to the issue.

inputs.name: markdown
inputs.description: convert the markdown format to Jira format.
